name: RoboMeds: Pharmacy Automation Using Image Processing Technology
description: Funded by SSN College Innovation Cell.
Engineered an intelligent robotic system to retrieve and dispense medicines in pharmacies.
Devised the use of QR codes to uniquely identify the medicine, implemented grid localization algorithms to find its location, and assembled a linear rail robotic arm to collect it.
Created a user-friendly mobile app to manage the medicine retrieval process.

name: Vihara – Temple Ticketing System
description: Built an integrated application system to streamline temple crowds: a mobile app for users to book entry slots and temple workers to scan tickets, and a web app for admin to control slot schedules and alerts.
Fine-tuned Gemini LLM to create a chatbot to assist visitors with temple information, nearby tourist attractions and itinerary planning.
Implemented AES-encrypted QR code tickets to prevent ticket duplication and ensure secure verification.
Designed real-time visitor monitoring to update live visitor counts and estimated queue time.

name: Newsphere: Personalized News Aggregator
description: Built a mobile app to learn user’s interests and curate relevant news articles in various Indian languages.
Learned and applied content-based and collaborative filtering methods to recommend articles based on user behavior on the app.
Performed Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) processes to fetch articles with News APIs, transform them into embeddings using NLP techniques.

name: EduVR: A Virtual Reality Tool for Intuitive Statistical Education on Machine Learning Algorithms
description: Co-authored a research paper, presented at the conference and selected for publication in Springer Nature.
Identified that existing Virtual Reality (VR) tools capture only the end result of different Machine Learning algorithms fed with static input data.

Pursued courses on Unity and C# to build a VR tool that enables users to input datasets, select fields to visualize, simulate and interact with the 3D visualization generated through each step of the algorithm.
Utilized this tool to interactively teach students in ML workshops at the IT Department Coding Club.

name: NutriChef: Personalized Meal-Planner
description: Created a recipe recommendation system based on dietary preferences.
Used Kansackapproach to suggest meal plans considering calorie, protein, fat and carb requirement.
Built a user-friendly interface for easy recipe search.
